com.musicbox.util.database

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.musicbox.util.database.DatabaseManager

  • public abstract class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class/module represents the DatabaseMangaer, witch is used to connect to MusicBox-MySQL-Database and insert, read, update or delete data.
    Author:
    David Wachs

      • setConnection

        public static boolean setConnection(java.lang.String conn)
        Create connection based on connections-string in conn param.
        Parameters:
        conn - represents the Connection-String to the MySQL-Database Format: jdbc:mysql://[host]/[database]?user=[username]&password=[password]
        Returns:
        true, if connection succeed

        Returns:

      • insertMusicRoom

        public static boolean insertMusicRoom(com.musicbox.util.database.entities.MusicRoom musicRoom)
        Inserts a new MusicRoom-Object into the database
        Parameters:
        musicRoom - the id-attribute is not needed, because it's auto increment. So the id attribute of the musicRoom-Object can have any value.
        Returns:
        true, if data saved successfully
